Package org.openscience.cdk.isomorphism.matchers.smarts

Class Summary
AliphaticAtom This matcher any non-aromatic atom.
AliphaticSymbolAtom This smarts atom matches aliphatic atom with element symbol specified
AnyAtom This matcher any Atom.
AnyOrderQueryBond This matches a bond of any order
AromaticAtom This matcher any aromatic atom.
AromaticOrSingleQueryBond This matches an aromatic or a single bond, used when no bond is specified between an atom
AromaticQueryBond This matches an aromatic bond
AromaticSymbolAtom This class matches aromatic atom with element symbol specified.
AtomicNumberAtom This matches an atom using the atomic number.
ChiralityAtom This matches an atom with chirality property.
ConnectionCountAtom This matcher checks the total valency of the Atom.
DegreeAtom This matcher checks the number of connections of the checked Atom with other Atom's.
ExplicitConnectionAtom This smarts atom matches any atom with a certain number of explicit connections.
FormalChargeAtom This matcher checks the formal charge of the Atom.
HybridizationNumberAtom This matcher checks the hybridization state of an atom.
HydrogenAtom This matches Hydrogen atoms.
ImplicitHCountAtom This matcher checks the number of implicit hydrogens of the Atom.
LogicalOperatorAtom This class matches a logical operator that connects two query atoms
LogicalOperatorBond This class matches a logical operator that connects two query bonds.
MassAtom This class matches an atom based on the atomic mass.
NonCHHeavyAtom This matcher any heavy atom that is not C or H.
OrderQueryBond This matches a bond with a certain bond order.
PeriodicGroupNumberAtom This matcher checks the periodic group number of an atom.
RecursiveSmartsAtom This matches recursive smarts atoms.
RingAtom This matches an atom in a specific size ring.
RingBond This smarts bond matches any bond that is in a ring.
RingIdentifierAtom This encapsulates an atom with a ring identifier, with an optional ring bond specified.
RingMembershipAtom This query atom matches any atom with a certain number of SSSR.
SmallestRingAtom This smarts atom matches any atom with the smallest SSSR size being a certain value.
SMARTSAtom Abstract smarts atom.
SMARTSBond Abstract smarts bond.
StereoBond This query bond matches bonds with specific stereo type.
TotalConnectionAtom This matches an atom using total number of connections.
TotalHCountAtom This matcher checks the formal charge of the Atom.
TotalRingConnectionAtom This matcher checks the number of ring connections of the checked Atom with other Atom's.
TotalValencyAtom This matcher checks the total valency of the Atom.
